name: Colourblind Chapter 1
description:
Colourblind Chapter 1

Colourblind is a 3D Story-Driven Comedy (Sort of) Puzzle Game powered by seamless storytelling about a Robot's journey to freedom.

Explore the Colourless Apocalyptic World of Robots and witness the story of Collin, together with his companion, Nearon, voiced by Jordan Walters, the 2 Robots must find a way to escape the world through the various puzzles across various and massive locations and discover the mysteries behind the world with no colour.

PUZZLE MECHANICS

  • COLOUR CUBES
  • COLOUR COMBINATION
  • COLOUR DISASSEMBLY
  • COLOUR COGWHEELS
  • COLOUR BUTTONS
  • CHAINED PLATFORMS
  • DOORS
  • WIND PADS
  • CUBE PUSHERS
  • CHARACTERS TALKING TO YOU FOR 7 HOURS STRAIGHT (just kidding)
